replies.body:
Me: Mom, I got a full ride to University of Washington!
Mom: That's great honey! What did you get it for?
Me: League of Legends!
Mom: ....
Can't wait to say that to my mom, just got to get out of bronze.... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
That UT vs. A&M game. Savage Riot, savage.
The only way that the UT vs A&M rivalry continues....LEAGUE! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
MBIR. I mean, I cant watch the football rivalry anymore {{item:3070}}
UT vs A&M?!?! The rivalry is back! in League! Can't wait to see two great programs compete as conference rivals again for the first time in years in a sport. Go horns!
Get ready for UT to get destroyed. Gig em.
Inb4 dumb aggies don't know how to computer
inb4 A&M made it to the finals last year, and UT didn't {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
but we obviously know how to league better am i right? Gig em
University of Chicago?  No surprise, they can practice on 5 ping.
10000000 fps on their supercomputers, 1 ms ping, pretty good
**BOILER UP!!!**
Ayyye Lets Go Purdue!!!!
We are boilermakers!{{item:3041}}
GO GREEN, GO WHITE!!!
Dad gets pissed that i don't cheer for MSU in football. I guess he can't complain if I'm loud during this! {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Think we need a new "Spartan's Will" commercial. {{champion:80}}
I'm sad the Washington game isn't getting broadcasted. BUT STILL. I'M SO EXCITED!!!!{{summoner:4}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}}
We will be broadcasting the games on our own, feel free to follow us on our [facebook](http://facebook.com/uwesports) page as we release more information on when those games will be broadcasted.
Aww its not, I thought i was going crazy not seeing it.
BTHO tu! **GIG EM AGS!**
<3 League growing so fast ! {{summoner:6}}
Finally!  A good reason to go to college!
Rito pls add University of Minnesota!. GO GOPHERS
It's not up to Rito lol. It's up to UoM to officially create and sponsor a team.
logged in to upvote! (for the first time ever)

SQUEEEEEEEEEEEE I'm so excited! I was looking for a way to watch these last season, so it's nice that at least a few games and the playoffs will be shown.

And please Rito. Georgia Institute of Technology.
Squeee?
Hush I'm very excited.
Makes me think of a sound a worm-like alien would make. Or a Pokemon...
WOOOOO! GO STATE! GO SPARTANS! MAKE UP FOR YOUR SHIT FOOTBALL PERFORMANCE!   {{champion:80}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:80}}
I can finally watch Texas A&M smash UT at something! Not that I can really taunt anyone that wears a UT shirt with it though...
I'm okay giving aTm a win in something that the general public won't know about
Very true. It's like when they were good at tennis... I cared -_-
Texas A&M gonna be win, I believe....{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Can't wait to start seeing people get to Harvard based on a LoL scholarship.
Rooting for THE Ohio State University! Go Bucks!! **O-H**

None of the University of Washington games will be streamed by Riot HOWEVER we will be streaming them independantly so everyone can still watch them! If you want to keep up with the schedule as well as other updates regarding the UW NACC team please check our  [facebook page!](https://www.facebook.com/uwesports/)
I had hopes and dreams of becoming a doctor, but my mom insisted I become a pro league of legends player
Living in Wisconsin so RMU MAKE US CHEESEHEADS PROUD
temple is on there but they aren't playing, why u no play temple why???
for reallll i wanna see temple play!

ay happy to see another temple fan lol
although I never actually ended up watching the campus series at all
O-H
I-O
RMU <3
